title: Pluang-Trading Saham AS Crypto
description: Pluang is a multi-asset investment app offering access to over 900 investment products, including Crypto, US Stocks, ETFs, Gold, and Mutual Funds. With advanced trading features like Stop Loss, Take Profit, and leverage, users can execute precise trading strategies on top crypto assets such as BTC, ETH, and more. Pluang also offers educational content through Pluang Academy and investment support tools like Trading Signals, Price Alerts, and Expert Insights.

title: INDmoney: Stocks, Mutual Funds
description: INDmoney is India’s all-in-one SuperMoneyApp, trusted by over 1.2 crore investors. It allows users to track, invest, and grow their money from a single platform. Key features include automatic tracking of all investments (Indian shares, US stocks, mutual funds, real estate, and more), expense management, and credit score monitoring.

title: Smartivity Magico
description: Smartivity Magico is a free companion app designed for interactive learning using Magico Stand and Letter, Number, and Shape Tiles. It helps children learn Math, Spelling, and Shape Recognition through engaging games. The app combines AI-driven learning with Computer Vision technology, transforming screen time into an educational experience.

title: Spell English
description: Kidzee Imagenie Spell-English, developed by Smartivity, is a unique educational activity designed for pre-K students to learn English using a Blended Learning approach that combines physical play with digital technology. The app requires the Kidzee Imagenie Spell-English set, including letter tiles and a stand, to function.

title: Paham by Nilai Inti Sekuritas
description: Paham is an Indonesian stock investment app managed by Nilai Inti Sekuritas (NIS), supervised by OJK. It provides users with a secure and easy way to invest in top Indonesian companies like BCA, Unilever, and Indofood. With low transaction fees and no minimum deposit required, Paham offers a hassle-free investment experience with a 100% online registration process.

title: Sharecare: Health & Well-being
description: Sharecare is an all-in-one health and wellness app designed to help users improve their well-being by offering personalized insights and recommendations. Whether you’re focused on sleep, weight loss, stress reduction, or finding a doctor, Sharecare provides tools and tips to help you achieve your health goals.

title: Sahicoin | Discover Crypto
description: Sahicoin is a global social network of crypto enthusiasts and market experts where users get the latest crypto news, trustworthy crypto recommendations and discover market insights effortlessly from the community. Sahicoin gamifies the investment journey for new investors in crypto with Sahifolio that allows users to practice investments and rewards experts for sharing their investment knowledge.

title: Mobi-Hub
description: A marketplace app that enables users to buy, sell, and chat within a community. The app offers features like membership management, secure transactions, and an intuitive user interface for seamless interaction.
